answers.answer: This is suspicious for immunodeficiency and should be evaluated by allergist/immunologist

question: Hello~I am HOPING that you could give me your opinion/interpretation based on the following lab results. Your help is GREATLY appreciated!!Serum protein Immunofixation: normal; no monoclonal IgIgG: low at 314IgA: low at 42IgM: wnl = 79CBC, Chem Panel, ESR, LDH: WNL w/the following exceptions...Globulin: low = 2.0Gamma globulin: 0.4A/G Ratio: high = 2.3Creatinine: 1.09GFR: 53Hx: 49 yo. white female; hx of NHL in remission; dx'd w/ hypogammaglobulinemia 2007; diabetes - type II; Hashimoto's thyroiditis; anti-cardiolipin antibodies and anti-phospholipid antibody syndrome w/ 3 DVTs; osteoporosis; recurrent URIs.THANK YOU so very much for expert opinion and assistance!!
title: PMID vs CVID vs MM vs Kidney Disease??
